headline: Palantir: Looking To Knock The Defense Prime Contractors Off Their Perch (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Palantir is reportedly looking to lead a tech-driven consortium in winning a larger share of defense spend. See why I'm revising my rating on PLTR stock to hold.
